snippet: No one was injured when two small blasts occurred outside churches just miles apart in the southern part of the state.
abstract: Small explosive devices are detonated outside Calvary Baptist Church and Holy Cross Roman Catholic Church in Las Cruces, NM; no injuries are reported; police are working to discover whether explosions, which occurred 20 minutes apart, are related.
lead_paragraph: No one was injured when two small blasts occurred outside churches just miles apart in the southern part of the state.

headline.main: Minutes Apart, 2 Explosions Shake New Mexico Churches
headline.print_headline: Minutes Apart, 2 Explosions Shake New Mexico Churches
